title: Cardinals hire Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as head coach

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Cardinals hire Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as head coach
sources.description: The Arizona Cardinals hire Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as their next coach, creating a second duo of brothers who are NFL head coaches.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Cardinals hire Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as head coach
sources.description: The Arizona Cardinals are hiring Rams OC Mike LaFleur as their next head coach. He fills the final open head coaching seat this offseason.
